com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema

Class VertexPrimaryDataHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema.SchemaHeap
      • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema.SchemaDataHeap
        • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema.VertexPrimaryDataHeap

  • public class VertexPrimaryDataHeap
extends SchemaDataHeap
    Representation of heap file for storage of vertex primary data.
    Data of an vertex is stored separately: primary data means 'first edge id', and 'property id', while other data exists, e.g. degree data for 'in-degree', 'out-degree' and 'total-degree
    Author:
    guobao.chen

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VertexPrimaryDataTuple createTuple(long vertexId, Object data)
      Creates a new HeapDataTuple instance and saves it to heap by specifying its external id and an object, usually an upper layer object like a vertex, edge or its property, which contains all needed data for the tuple to be created.
      HeapDataTuple deleteTuple(long vertexId)
      Deletes a HeapDataTuple instance permanently from heap file by specifying its external id.

      Returns data length in bytes

      Returns length in bytes for vertex data stored in heap file
